heading: Security & Compliance
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Ruby on Rails — A full-stack framework to build amazing web apps
productCards.description: Rendering HTML templates, updating databases, sending and receiving emails, maintaining live pages via WebSockets, enqueuing jobs for asynchronous work, storing uploads in the cloud, providing solid security protections for common attacks. Rails does it all and so much more.

productCards.title: Cloudflare — The web performance & security company
productCards.description: Cloudflare is a leading edge network services provider that offers a wide range of solutions to enhance the security, performance, and reliability of websites and applications. With its global network infrastructure and advanced technologies, Cloudflare empowers businesses to build a faster, more secure, and resilient online presence.

productCards.title: Clerk — An authentication and user management platform
productCards.description: A complete suite of embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage your users.

productCards.title: Telegram 4.7 — Cloud-based, secure messaging app
productCards.description: Telegram Messenger is a globally accessible freemium, cross-platform, encrypted, cloud-based and centralized instant messaging service.

productCards.title: Infisical — Helping dev teams sync environment variables
productCards.description: A simple, end-to-end encrypted platform that enables Node.js teams to sync and manage their environment variables. Developers can modify start/dev scripts to pull and inject environment variables into local environments with 1 line of code.

productCards.title: Persona — Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
productCards.description: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.

productCards.title: WorkOS — Your app, Enterprise Ready
productCards.description: WorkOS provides APIs to make your app Enterprise Ready, with pre-built features and integrations required by IT admins. Start selling to enterprise customers with just a few lines of code. Add Single Sign-On (SSO), Directory Sync, Audit Logs and more to your app today.

productCards.title: Stytch — User infrastructure for modern applications
productCards.description: Stytch is a full stack authentication and authorization platform, whose APIs make it simple to seamlessly onboard, authenticate and engage users. Improve security and user experience by going passwordless.

productCards.title: Sardine — A fraud and financial crime protection platform
productCards.description: Protect every customer interaction from financial crime. Used by banks, retailers, and fintechs to detect fraud patterns, prevent money laundering, and stop sophisticated scams.

productCards.title: Middesk — A business identity platform
productCards.description: A suite of identity products to help companies across the US verify their commercial customers.
